moves.name: Basic Bounce
moves.description: Tap the screen rhythmically to maintain a steady bounce. The ball responds to your timing - find your rhythm!

moves.name: Double Tap
moves.description: Quick double tap creates a higher bounce, giving you more time for the next move. Master the timing!

moves.name: Spin Control
moves.description: Hold and slide to add spin, creating curved trajectories. Perfect for style points!

moves.name: Combo Chain
moves.description: Chain different moves together to create spectacular combinations. The key to high scores!

moves.name: Air Time
moves.description: Master the perfect timing to keep the ball in the air longer. Increase your score multiplier with each successful float!

moves.name: Power Bounce
moves.description: Charge your bounce by holding down, then release for an explosive upward trajectory. Great for starting complex combinations!
